BackstoryDef.title: duffer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: To make ends meet for [PAWN_possessive] family, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] siblings would lurk behind the bushes of nearby ranches, only to emerge during the night and steal the cattle and peddle it for money the next day. This little game eventually came to a halt, when [PAWN_nameDef]’s eldest sibling was shot and killed during a heist by an onlooking rancher.

BackstoryDef.title: honorary impid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Having sustained harsh injuries while exploring a sprawl of desert ruins, [PAWN_nameDef] sought refuge in an Impid community, who imprisoned and nursed [PAWN_objective] back to health. [PAWN_nameDef] soon sweet-talked [PAWN_possessive] way out of [PAWN_possessive] dank jail cell and onto a patch of Impid soil where [PAWN_pronoun] grew exotic crops and trees.

BackstoryDef.title: moirologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional mourner. [PAWN_pronoun] lurked outside places of worship and mourning, offering [PAWN_possessive] services to the deceased’s family in exchange for silver coin or two. During the funeral, [PAWN_nameDef] would wail and weep for the deceased, making it seem that their passing was truly heartbreaking for [PAWN_objective], when in reality, it really made [PAWN_possessive] day, for [PAWN_pronoun] was much richer for it.

BackstoryDef.title: shill
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] partner-in-crime performed public scams to swindle money out of passers-by. This fraudulent lifestyle had it’s ups and downs, but came to a halt following the assault of [PAWN_possessive] partner-in-crime. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] couldn’t show [PAWN_possessive] face to [PAWN_possessive] partner again, instead harbouring all of the guilt for not being able to stop the attack, and spiralling into a lifelong depression.

BackstoryDef.title: drunk
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Every ditch, gutter and hole in the ground was a bed if [PAWN_nameDef] was drunk enough. And usually, [PAWN_pronoun] was. Young satyrs and fauns threw pebbles and twigs at [PAWN_nameDef] as part of a game, but [PAWN_nameDef] was typically too inebriated to notice or even care.

BackstoryDef.title: barsong hero
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] sang songs of merriment, songs of joy, songs that others couldn't help but sing along to, to entertain the guests at [PAWN_possessive] village inn. The innkeepers gained so much business from these nightly sing-songs that [PAWN_nameDef] could have all the beer [PAWN_pronoun] liked, which was [PAWN_possessive] favourite form of payment.

BackstoryDef.title: tourist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With little more than the hand-woven satchel on [PAWN_possessive] back, [PAWN_nameDef] set out on a quest to travel across the globe and learn about other xenotype cultures. Now very educated, [PAWN_nameDef] wishes to pass on what they learned to other satyrs...if only they would pay attention.

BackstoryDef.title: fifer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] played the fife while [PAWN_possessive] battalion marched to face its foes. [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed so much bloodshed that very little can phase [PAWN_objective] anymore.
